discussion.content:
yes D
Provides a vendor ID along with a vendor-specific type value to uniquely identify a member type.

questions.question_text: Which statement about enhanced zoning is true?

choices.A: Changes to the zoning database and subsequent distribution require reactivation of the zone set.
choices.B: It does not support fWWN-based membership in the standard interop mode (interop mode 1).
choices.D: It provides a vendor ID along with a vendor-specific type value to uniquely identify a member type.
choices.C: It cannot move back to basic zoning from enhanced zoning without a clean wipe and restore of the switches in the fabric.

discussion.content:
and C: Note

When persistent FC IDs are enabled, FC IDs cannot be changed after a reboot. FC IDs are enabled by default, but can be disabled for each VSAN.
E: The current FC IDs in use in the fcdomain are saved across reboots.

choices.A: If you connect to the switch from a Windows host, be sure to enable the persistent FC ID feature in the VSAN that connects these hosts
choices.C: When persistent FC IDs are enabled, FC IDs cannot be changed after a reboot.
choices.B: Entries that the switch has learned must be manually acknowledged to be stored in the FCDomain FCID database.
choices.E: The current FC IDs in use in the fcdomain are saved across reboots.
choices.D: A persistent FC ID that is assigned to an F Port cannot be moved across interfaces if the same persistent FC ID is to be maintained.

questions.question_text: Which two statements about the Cisco Fibre Channel Domain feature and persistent FC IDs are true? (Choose two.)

Refer to the exhibit. Which two statements about the health of the displayed tenant are true? (Choose two.)
//IMG//

choices.E: The health score provides a summary indication of health as a score from 1 to 99.
choices.B: The current health score is good and indicates that all EPGs of this tenant are deployed.
choices.D: Faults directly related to this tenant caused by access policies must be viewed in the Fabric > Access Policies tab.
choices.A: The health score is good, but further investigation is needed to determine the health of the EPGs.
choices.C: The tenant health score has not changed over the displayed period of time.

discussion.content:
A and C
The score is 1-100 not to 99
I donÂ´t think that E is correct. 100% should be possible in theory.

choices.D: It tracks cloud usage statistics for billing purposes.
choices.E: It provides the authentication and authorization services. AB
choices.B: It is considered the cloud computing fabric controller.
choices.C: It provides persistent block storage to running instances of virtual machines.

questions.question_text: In OpenStack, which two statements about the NOVA component are true? (Choose two.)

Refer the exhibit. Some time ago you enabled statistics collection with the internal stats database and received a report that the /bootflash partition is full. Which two options to resolve the issue are true? (Choose two.)
//IMG//

choices.B: Add additional physical volume to VOlGroup01.
choices.A: Stop pmon and drop PostgreSQL DB.
